_header: In summer when the leaves spring
_description: ‘Robyn Hode and the Potter’ — about eighty quatrains

CULEe435a.First Lines:
In schomer when the leves spryngThe bloschens on euery
                    bowe…
CULEe435a.Last Lines:
…God haffe mersey on Roben hodys sette& saffe all god
                    yemanrey
